page.title: 18A Senior Citizen's day,Snape
page.content: One senior citizen who has lived in Snape for 64 years, told us about her day.She gets up at 8 a.m. For breakfast she has a cup of tea. In the morning she does housework.For lunch she has meat and vegetables.In the afternoon she knits, sews and does various odd jobs. In the evening she goes to whist or domino drives or watches television. She goes to bed between 10 p.m. and 10.30 p.m. She likes living in Snape because it is a quiet, friendly village. She does her shopping in Bedale. If she needs to get out of the village, she travels by bus or car. Her interests and hobbies are knitting and sewing.
